show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #39 Chris Redman "A Masters in Cowboying"
subtitle: #39 Chris Redman "A Masters in Cowboying"
summary:
Join us this week for a great chat with our friend Chris Redman about how to assemble and maintain a killer ranch management team.
Chris shares his kick ass proven steps to hire the right person for the job.
